column5: Where is the Odyssey being held in St. Catharines? Also, are we meeting up for breakfast somewhere?

Roger, the Odyssee is at the Quality Hotel, 325 Ontario St. and starting at 8:00  A few of us are meeting for breakfast at 7:00 at the Golden Griddle.  Take the 1st exit past Ontario and follow it around to Dunlop St & we'll see you there.  http://www.weblocal.ca/golden-griddle-fami...harines-on.html
That is the Lake st ramp, then go left. .
Thanks guys, see you there hopefully
Looking forward to it Rizz, hope more can make it out, its always a good time.
I'll be on the road at 4AM, by the time I get down to St. Catherines, I'll be ready for breakfast. Looking forward to seeing you boys down there.  Cheers, Ron...
I'll see if I can make it to the brekkie meeting of the minds. There's also Perkins across the bridge at the Days Inn (formerly Howard Johnsons).
There will be an apres-Odyssey room available for socializing from 6pm till 10pm, with a bar!
Looking forward to Seeing everyone on Saturday Morning...in time for breakfast.  By the way, does this Golden Griddle serve a buffet type breakfast, at that time of day?  John
I don't recall a buffet  that early John , but they always put on an excellent breakfast otherwise.  See you and everyone else at 7
